item.title: Quest interface?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

It’s probably the interface ID.

Yeah, what did I tell you.

The interface you want is 8134.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("info")) { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dre@Information", 8144); //Title sendQuest("PK/Economy Based server", 8145); sendQuest("----", 8147); sendQuest("Make your own money", 8148); sendQuest("As a pker or", 8149); sendQuest("Skiller.", 8150); sendQuest(" ", 8151); sendQuest("We have bosses and rare drops", 8152); sendQuest("::boss1", 8153); sendQuest("more are soon to come.", 8154); showInterface(8134);

Read full topic

item.title: Quest interface?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

What’s up with the String name? That’s not required, delete it and retry.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("info")) { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dre@Information", 8144); //Title sendQuest("PK/Economy Based server", 8145); sendQuest("----", 8147); sendQuest("Make your own money", 8148); sendQuest("As a pker or", 8149); sendQuest("Skiller.", 8150); sendQuest(" ", 8151); sendQuest("We have bosses and rare drops", 8152); sendQuest("::boss1", 8153); sendQuest("more are soon to come.", 8154); showInterface(8133);

I’m pretty sure that’s all you need.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest interface?

item.description:
@checkmeup wrote:

Im not at all familiar with the quest interface stuff or whatever it is haha

i want it to were you put in like for example ::info
then your text blah blah

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("info") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Information", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("PK/Economy Based server", 8145); sendQuest("----", 8147); sendQuest("Make your own money", 8148); sendQuest("As a pker or", 8149); sendQuest("Skiller.", 8150); sendQuest(" ", 8151); sendQuest("We have bosses and rare drops", 8152); sendQuest("::boss1", 8153); sendQuest("more are soon to come.", 8154); sendQuestSomething(8144); showInterface(8133); flushOutStream();

I get Dced every time…
any help?
